roleset.name: (make) become ripe

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: It's made only in years when the grapes ripen perfectly (the last was 1979) and comes from a single acre of grapes that yielded a mere 75 cases in 1987.

example.name: agentive
example.text: John ripened the green peaches in a paper bag.

roleset.note: That won't work, by the way; peaches don't get any sweeter once they leave the tree. Always buy tree-ripened peaches.
